mapper.select: SELECT t.dep_id AS depId, t.dep_name AS depName, t.ins_id AS insId, t2.ins_name AS insName, t2.bus_type_id as busTypeId, t.path_code AS pathCode, t.address AS address, t.area AS area, t.contactor AS contactor, t.Is_Valid AS isValid, t.REMARK AS remark FROM t_admin_department t LEFT JOIN t_admin_institution t2 ON t.ins_id = t2.ins_id left JOIN t_admin_dep_user t3 on t.dep_id = t3.dep_id where 1=1 and t2.bus_type_id = #{busTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t3.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
